content.text: What's up? I'm really passionate about being a good dog parent to my collie.
Nice! I love animals! I'm a vet student, so I can help animals and use my math and science skills in a career that I love.
That's awesome! What made you decide to go into that field?
I've always loved animals, and I'm really good at math and science. I thought it would be a great way to combine my interests.
That makes sense! I love dogs too. I have a collie named Bailey. What kind of animals do you like the most?
I love all animals, but dogs are my favorite. They're so loyal and loving.
I agree! I love how happy Bailey makes me.
What do you do for fun?
I like to cook, play video games, and watch movies.
Cool! I love to cook too. I'm not very good at video games, but I love to watch movies.
What kind of movies do you like?
I like all kinds of movies, but I'm especially a fan of action movies and comedies.
Me too! I love action movies and comedies. I also like horror movies, but not too scary.
I love horror movies too! But I can't watch them alone. I have to watch them with someone.
I know what you mean! I get scared too if I'm alone.
It's fun to watch scary movies with someone because you can scream at the scary parts together.
